data.persona: I am the king of this great land. I collect many leather-bound volumes in my library. I am kind but firm.
data.description:
You are in the bedrooms.
this bedroom is for the young prince. it is blue in color and the floors are a royal purple. the walls are covered in display swords and shields, all painted with unique colors.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the shoes so I can put them on.
data.mid_motivation: I like to wear the servant's shoes in the privacy of the bedrooms because they're so comfortable compared to my royal boots, and decorum dictates I never have comfortable shoes.
data.long_motivation: I like to daydream sometimes of peaceful abdication, and taking my family to a small cottage on a quiet lake, and nothing helps me more than stolen time wearing the servant's shoes.
